Summary: Hookers, drug dealers, a shooting down stairs, bring your gun. OMG it was lke we were in a bad movie, it was terrifying to stay there also our car was stolen too. But generally it was the most dangerous place I have ever stayed in.

We were here for 5 days while in town to visit family and we had a wonderful time.  Our kids loved the pool.  We were in room #138 on the 1st floor.  Room was nice and clean with tiles floor and had a little kitchenette in the back.  Free Wi-Fi which was great!  Very quiet at night.  Young and friendly staffs.  We will definitely stay here again.  Thanks Guest Inn!
Bad Cstomer Service...nasty...prostitutes..drug dealers...no wonder y its hidden!

I just stayed here for 2 weeks and I loved it!  Room was very nice and clean.  My room was on the 1st floor with tiles floor.  The kitchenette in the room was a plus for me.  Surprisingly very quiet at night.  plenty of parking and free wifi.  I will stay here again the next time I'm in the area for business.

There are so many things wrong with this place it's hard to name them all. Let's start with the obvious. First, they advertise a "Free Pool", but it was closed for months with this sign posted. Now, it is filthy and has HORRIBLE PH levels; it is never cleaned. Second, they advertise "High-Speed Internet", but it is the slower than any any dial-up ISP I have ever seen. Furthermore, half the day, they have the internet turned off so that the managers can use all the bandwidth for their personal laptops. There is also a ring of prostitutes and drug-dealers that operate out of this hotel, but the Santa Ana Police Department won't investigate (probably paid off by the hotel owners). I wouldn't care about this point, but they are inconsiderately loud through all hours of the night
